New Records: Endrick scored his first goal for Brazil in his debut
Key Match Events: Endrick's 80th-minute goal turned the game in Brazil's favor
Pre-Game Insights: This was Southgate's first match in charge of England
Post-Match Reflections: Brazil secured a significant win under their new coach
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Wembley Stadium in front of 83,664 fans
Others: England had 52.9% possession and 14 shot attempts, while Brazil had 5 shots on target
